name: Germanified Duolingo Tree
description: I learn German in Duolingo so I thought it would be cool to make the tree look a bit more German.
additional_info:
It is not quite finished yet, but looks nice I think. I might edit it later but Duolingo's class names are just absolute gibberish and its quite hard to work with for me now :p

(Also there might be tons of mistakes   ( ⚆ _ ⚆ )    )

Edit: Apparently I can't use non-google imports in my css, so Fraktur won't be shown unless you manually change the CSS. Changed all the fonts to Georgia serif and realized it looks way much less good sorry for that.    ಠ╭╮ಠ
